Ecosystem

Part of the $AT Ecosystem

Launchpad

The IDO will give community members the chance to get in on the ground floor and claim a new token on the launchpad.

Liquidity Aggregator

Traders use liquidity aggregators to find the best possible price across a variety of liquidity pools.

Farming/Staking

With each IDO launched on our platform, a new farming pool will be deployed based on the launched token.

NFT Marketplace

Users can easily create as many collectibles as they wish, sell them, or decide not to sell on this network.

AT Finance Launchpad

Join the community. Be the first to decentralize the way you raise capital for your ideas.

Tokenomics

100,000,000 Total Supply

Token Network: Binance Smart Chain (BSC)
Token Type: BEP-20

Token Distribution

40% Pre-Sale Token Distribution

Deflationary Token

AT Finance has a unique burning mechanism automatically sent to burn address with every transaction. Burning tokens essentially eliminate them from the available stock, making them more expensive.

Burning Cycle

When a token is excluded from the current pool of cryptocurrencies in circulation, it is burned. Thus, $AT will run for a total of 148 cycles.

Burn Rate

As people transact, the sum of tokens in your wallet will continue to grow indefinitely. Therefore, the burn rate for AT Finance is from 5% to 12%.

Rebase

This burn will cause a positive rebase when the total burned tokens exceed the target threshold and distributing 50% of the burnt supply to token holders.

FAQs

General Frequently Asked Questions
1 Is it safe to invest in $AT?

Yes, it is safe to invest in $AT.

2 What is AT Finance?

AT Finance is a technology developed to achieve the vision of Binance Smart Chain (BSC) that was meant to step in by creating a clever, robust, and easy to use banking system that anybody in the crypto world can access.

3 How much is $AT total token supply, and will it be stable?

$AT maximum token supply will be 100,000,000. Due to that, token supply will be deflationary.

4 Why does AT Finance need blockchain technology?

AT Finance needs blockchain to validate the data that comes in and goes out.

5 Is AT Finance a Stablecoin?

No. Stablecoins have a fixed value or fluctuate around it (usually pegged to fiat coins such as USD, EUR, etc.). AT Finance is a BEP20-compliant token that runs on the Binance Smart Chain

6 What is AT Finance's mission?

AT Finance believes that a vital foundation for global, distributed economies would be blockchain-based markets. Therefore, $AT tokens are produced and incorporated into the scheme, reflecting the mission of thoroughly implementing BEP20-compliant technology into the market.
